control.description: Show search button on home screen
control.label: Show search button on home screen
Move Favorites Button to main menu (ONLY works if main menu isn't full!)
- Make Favorites button first main menu item
Hide some view types for simplicity ([COLOR=firebrick]Enable[/COLOR] = Only show List + Wall Views)
Switch Wall Views ([COLOR=firebrick]Enable[/COLOR] = Wall View with more items becomes Default Wall)
Hide some fullscreen VideoOSD buttons for simplicity (rewind/fforward)
Automatically pause/resume playback when using INFO button in VideoOSD
[COLOR=red]![/COLOR] EXPERIMENTAL SECTION (use at your own RISK)
Show logo-screen while in progress of shutdown/reboot/logout
[COLOR=firebrick]Note: Audio Passthrough has to be DISABLED before using this![/COLOR]
Enable VolumeAmplification-DRC automatically (ONLY for movies in library)
- Show VolumeAmplification-DRC toggle-button in VideoOSD (except LiveTV)
